name: Learn Math With Timmy: Math games
description: Do you think learning math is difficult and boring?  Let Timmy help you :) He will tell you learning math is easier than it seems!  Math Learner app organizes skills and lessons effectively with scientifically proven learning method. This is the best math learning app with fun & engaging lessons for pre-K to Grade 6.  This app is free & fun. You do not need to buy subscriptions to learn math like the other apps. Beside learning math, Math learner app has many math games to help your kids relax!  Key Features: - Using A.I to recognize your hand-writing numbers - 3000+ levels in math learner app. Each level adapts to your childs age from pre-K to Grade 6. - Study through levels with effective lessons and master math skills: addition, subtraction, multiplication, division - Unlock many funny items for Timmy :) - Support Montessori theme, help your kid learn math easier - Add more math games: match numbers, find numbers  Free math learner game for everyone. Best math learner practice. Improve your mathematics & IQ.
